      • checkVelocity

        public void checkVelocity(int ID)
        Checks the velocity of the character whether it moved vertically or fell off the map. Notifies the view if the character moved, fell off, or hit a token
        Parameters:
        ID - Specifies the character

      • respawn

        public void respawn(int ID)
        Calls the respawn method in the character class to respawn the character at the levels original spawn point
        Parameters:
        ID - Specifies the character that is being respawned

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Mcharacter object that is returned

      • refreshDisplay

        public void refreshDisplay()
        Refreshes the display for all objects. Notifies the view of the data to be refreshed.

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.Object obj)
        Notify the observers of a change to the player/enemy/obstacle object(s) on the current stage
        Parameters:
        obj - as Object - The object that should be passed to the update method of any observer(s)
